title: D701 Pro 4G DashCam
metaDesc: Rugged D701 4G Dashcam designed for logistics and heavy transport, featuring tamper-proof data security.
fullDescription: The D701 Pro is built for the demanding needs of logistics and heavy transport. It features a lockable SD card slot for data security and supports additional external cameras for blind spot monitoring. Its robust design ensures reliability on long hauls.
features: Lockable storage slot to prevent data tampering
Advanced GPS tracking with route history
Wide voltage range for truck compatibility
packaging: 1x D701 Unit, 2x Keys, 1x Hardwire Kit, 1x External Cam (Optional)
